name: amend_booking_luggage_details
description: Update the baggage information of a reservation.

new_total_baggage_count.description: The new total number of baggage items.

new_chargeable_baggage_count.description: The new number of non-free baggage items.

payment_method_for_fees.description: The ID of the payment method to use.

name: change_booking_itinerary
description: Update the flight information of a reservation.

payment_source_for_update.description: The ID of the payment method to use.

name: create_new_booking
description: Book a reservation for flights with specified passengers and payment methods.

traveler_user_id.description: The ID of the user making the reservation (e.g., "sara_doe_496").

flight_origin_iata.description: The origin airport code in three letters (e.g., "JFK").

flight_destination_iata.description: The destination airport code in three letters (e.g., "LAX").

flight_number.description: The unique identifier for the flight (e.g., "HAT001").

chosen_flight_legs.description:
A list of flight dictionaries. Each flight dictionary
must contain the following structure:

dob.description: The passenger's date of birth in "YYYY-MM-DD" format (e.g., "1990-01-01").

list_of_travelers.description:
A list of passenger dictionaries. Each passenger
dictionary must contain the following structure:

payment_id.description: The ID of the payment method to use (e.g., "credit_card_4421486").

amount.description: The amount to be charged for this payment (e.g., 250.0).

payment_details.description:
A list of payment method dictionaries. Each
payment dictionary must contain the following structure:

total_luggage_count.description: The total number of baggage items (non-negative integer, e.g., 2).

paid_luggage_count.description: The number of non-free baggage items (non-negative integer, e.g., 1).

name: escalate_to_support_agent
description: Transfer the user to a human agent, with a summary of the user's issue.

case_summary_for_escalation.description: A summary of the user's issue.

name: evaluate_mathematical_query
description: Calculate the result of a mathematical expression.

name: fetch_customer_profile
description: Get the details of a user, including their reservations.

name: find_connecting_flights
description: Search one-stop flights between two cities on a specific date.

departure_city_code.description: The origin city airport in three letters, such as 'JFK'.

arrival_city_code.description: The destination city airport in three letters, such as 'LAX'.

desired_travel_date.description: The date of the flight in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

name: find_nonstop_flights
description: Search direct flights between two cities on a specific date.

departure_airport_code.description: The origin city airport in three letters, such as 'JFK'.

arrival_airport_code.description: The destination city airport in three letters, such as 'LAX'.

flight_search_date.description: The date of the flight in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'.

name: get_available_airports
description: List all airports and their corresponding cities based on available flights.

name: issue_travel_voucher
description: Send a certificate to a user.

recipient_customer_id.description: The ID of the user to send the certificate to.

name: log_internal_thought
description:
Use the tool to think about something. It will not obtain new information 

or change the database, but just append the thought to the log.

name: modify_booking_travelers
description: Update the passenger information of a reservation.

name: retrieve_booking_information
description: Get the details of a reservation.
